body:
backport of #42320

#### PR description:

From the description of #42320:

> This PR includes a possibile solution for the issue discussed in #40174 (see that issue for details), thanks to suggestions from @cms-sw/tracking-pog-l2.
>
> In this PR, a check is added to `LayerMeasurements` in order to skip `TrajectoryStateOnSurface` objects whose global position is well outside the detector volume. The rationale of this check was discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/40174#issuecomment-1640703758.

#### PR validation:

None beyond the checks done for #42320.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#42320

Preemptive fix for potential HLT crashes in `CMSSW_13_2_X`.
title: add layer-TSOS compatibility check in `LayerMeasurements` [`13_2_X`]
